trans-unit.source: * Added this CHANGES file and a description for PyPI (devurandom)
trans-unit.target: *添加了此CHANGES文件和对PyPI（devurandom）的描述

trans-unit.source: * Or you can provide a complete URL: ``hg ftp ftp://user:psw@host/basedir``
trans-unit.target: *或者您可以提供一个完整的URL：``hg ftp ftp：// user：psw @ host / basedir``

trans-unit.source: * You can select it like: ``hg ftp myhost``
trans-unit.target: *您可以像这样选择它：``hg ftp myhost''

trans-unit.source: * automatic backups of remote files (jaltek)
trans-unit.target: *远程文件的自动备份（jaltek）

trans-unit.source: * bugfixes (devurandom)
trans-unit.target: *错误修正（devurandom）

trans-unit.source: * documentation and metadata updates, confirming to current Mercurial extension guidelines (devurandom)
trans-unit.target: *文档和元数据更新，以确认当前的Mercurial扩展指南（devurandom）

trans-unit.source: * setuptools packaging (devurandom)
trans-unit.target: * setuptools包装（devurandom）

trans-unit.source: -a --all upload all files of a changeset; do not use the difference
trans-unit.target: -a --all上载变更集的所有文件；不要使用差异

trans-unit.source: -d --dir CHMOD new directories to given mode
trans-unit.target: -d --dir CHMOD将新目录设置为给定模式

trans-unit.source: -f --file CHMOD new/changed files to given mode
trans-unit.target: -f --file CHMOD将新的/更改的文件更改为给定模式

trans-unit.source: -g --global make the tag global
trans-unit.target: -g --global使标记全局

trans-unit.source: -o --only only upload or remove files; do not set a tag
trans-unit.target: -o-仅上传或删除文件；不要设置标签

trans-unit.source: -r --rev revision that will be uploaded
trans-unit.target: -r --rev修订版将被上传

trans-unit.source: -s --show show files that will be uploaded or deleted
trans-unit.target: -s --show显示将被上传或删除的文件

trans-unit.source: -t --tag use another tag name
trans-unit.target: -t --tag使用另一个标签名

trans-unit.source: -u --upload start uploading or removing changed files
trans-unit.target: -u --upload开始上传或删除更改的文件

trans-unit.source: 1. Add your website files to mercurial
trans-unit.target: 1.将你的网站文件添加到 mercurial

trans-unit.source: 2. Upload initial snapshot to ftp server (set ``uploaded@host`` tag)
trans-unit.target: 2.将初始快照上传到ftp服务器(设置``uploaded@host``标签)。

trans-unit.source: 3. Do many commits to your website files
trans-unit.target: 3.对你的网站文件进行多次提交

trans-unit.source: 4. Upload only new/changed files to your last uploaded snapshot (and remove vanished files)
trans-unit.target: 4.只将新的/更改的文件上传到上次上传的快照中(并删除已消失的文件)。

trans-unit.source: CHANGES
trans-unit.target: 变化

trans-unit.source: First packaged version. Changes compared to the original 2012 version by André Klitzing (misery):
trans-unit.target: 第一个打包版本。与AndréKlitzing（苦难）的原始2012版本相比的更改：

trans-unit.source: If ``--rev`` is not provided it will use the current revision of your working dir. But it won't use uncommitted changes of that working dir. There will be no prefix if you use ``--tag``!
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供``--rev``,它将使用你的工作目录的当前版本。但它不会使用该工作目录中未提交的修改。如果你使用``--tag``,将不会有前缀!

trans-unit.source: If an error happens on server-side on deleting or CHMODing a file
trans-unit.target: 如果在服务器端删除或CHMODing文件时发生了错误。

trans-unit.source: If you add ``chmod_file`` or ``chmod_dir`` it will ``CHMOD`` it on upload. If there is no option for chmod the extension won't call ``SITE CHMOD`` on ftp server.
trans-unit.target: 如果你添加了``chmod_file``或``chmod_dir``,它将在上传时``CHMOD``。如果没有chmod的选项,扩展就不会在ftp服务器上调用``SITE CHMOD``。

trans-unit.source: If you don't provide a ``destination`` commandline argument, hgftp will use ``ftp`` in ``[paths]`` by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果你没有提供``destination``命令行参数,hgftp将默认使用``[paths]``中的``ftp``。

trans-unit.source: If your username contains an ``@`` character, encode it as ``%40`` to avoid confusing Python's ``urlsplit()`` function.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的用户名包含一个``@``字符,将其编码为``%40``以避免混淆Python的``urlsplit()``函数。

trans-unit.source: Important
trans-unit.target: 重要信息

trans-unit.source: Info
trans-unit.target: 资讯

trans-unit.source: It will upload all files of a revision and set a (local) tag like
trans-unit.target: 它将上传一个修订版的所有文件,并设置一个(本地)标签,如

trans-unit.source: Just commit upstream changes to branch ``vanilla`` and your modified version will be in ``default``. So you can merge it on new upstream versions and use this extension to upload your synced snapshot.
trans-unit.target: 只要提交上游变化到分支``vanilla``,你的修改版本就会在``default``中。所以你可以在新的上游版本中合并它,并使用这个扩展来上传你的同步快照。

trans-unit.source: My use case for this plugin is to manage uploads of websites. If you have your website (.html, .php, etc.) under mercurial control you can easily upload snapshots to your provider. If you change something on your site you only need to upload the difference of the last uploaded snapshot and the current/selected revision without to do it yourself.
trans-unit.target: 我对这个插件的用例是管理网站的上传。如果你的网站(.html,.php等)在mercurial的控制下,你可以很容易地上传快照到你的供应商。如果你改变了你网站上的一些东西,你只需要上传上次上传的快照和当前/选择的修订版的差异,而不需要自己动手。

trans-unit.source: Notes
trans-unit.target: 笔记

trans-unit.source: Options
trans-unit.target: 选项

trans-unit.source: Really useful if you use a modified version of existing open source wikis/forums/cms and wants to be in sync with upstream changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用现有的开源wiki/forums/cms的修改版本,并希望与上游的变化同步,那么真的很有用。

trans-unit.source: Since Mercurial doesn't track directories it won't delete existing
trans-unit.target: 由于Mercurial不跟踪目录,所以不会删除现有的目录。

trans-unit.source: The extension will only start uploading / removing your files if you provide ``--upload`` as an option. A tag will only be set if upload was successful.
trans-unit.target: 只有当你提供"``--upload``"作为一个选项时,扩展才会开始上传/删除你的文件。只有在上传成功的情况下才会设置标签。

trans-unit.source: There are some options that can overwrite settings in your hgrc::
trans-unit.target: 有一些选项可以覆盖hgrc中的设置:。

trans-unit.source: This is **not** a command for push/pull over ftp!
trans-unit.target: 这不是**个通过ftp进行推/拉的命令!

trans-unit.source: Upload snapshots of a revision to one or more FTP server
trans-unit.target: 将修订版的快照上传到一个或多个FTP服务器。

trans-unit.source: Upload snapshots of a revision to one or more FTP server.
trans-unit.target: 将修订版的快照上传至一个或多个FTP服务器。

trans-unit.source: Use Case
trans-unit.target: 使用案例

trans-unit.source: You can add multiple destinations to ``[paths]`` like in push/pull::
trans-unit.target: 你可以在``[路径]``中添加多个目的地,就像推/拉:一样。

trans-unit.source: [ftp]
trans-unit.target: [ftp]

trans-unit.source: [paths]
trans-unit.target: [路径]

trans-unit.source: ``[paths]``
``uploaded@host``. If it will find an existing tag for that host it
trans-unit.target: `uploaded @ host``。如果它将找到该主机的现有标签，

trans-unit.target: chmod_dir=755

trans-unit.target: chmod_file=644

trans-unit.target: 服务器上的目录,即使没有文件了。

trans-unit.target: ftp=ftp://[user[:pass]@]host[:port]/[path]。

trans-unit.target: global_tags=False

trans-unit.target: hgrc

trans-unit.target: 它只会打印一个警告,但如果不能的话,它就会中止。

trans-unit.target: myhost=_COPY17@incubo.de/htdocs

trans-unit.target: prefix_tags=uploaded@

trans-unit.target: 该修订版和新版。
